overview: Hye-in, who arrived in South Korea alone, facing death, is spending each day with a hard heart rather than joy because of the fact that she came alone and her exhausted mind during the process of escaping North Korea. On her first day of school, which is both thrilling and frightening, her students accuse and ridicule her students of discrimination  . At that time, Yu-jin approaches and talks to Hye-in, who is alone with her. Unaccustomed to her kind attention, Hye-in continues to push Eu-jin away from her. But she doesn't care and Yujin keeps attacking...
title: Takdongmu
